mapper.select: select p.post_id AS post_id, p.title AS title, p.content AS content, p.pic_post AS pic_post, p.time_post AS time_post, u.name AS name, u.avator AS avator FROM post p INNER JOIN customer c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY p.time_post DESC
